channel.title: [BUG] Royal blood (linux)
channel.description:
#### What happened?
When looking through the class cards outside of a game (in lobby), I can't see that they have royal blood, this is the affected classes: prince and princess(Duchess). This works in game tho, and shows up right passive skill. This is true for both classic and casual, and OpenGL and Vulkan.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
In passive it's suppose to tell that they have royal blood
#### Steps to reproduce:
Got confirmation from another Linux user @ofLegends Has been tested in both Vulkan and OpenGL and on classic and casual mode.
#### Comments:
Screenshot: https://imgur.com/a/Y1216pX https://imgur.com/a/twoSina

item.title: [BUG] Royal blood (linux)
item.dc:creator: lebh
item.description:
I shows up fine for The Drunk(The Alcoholic) and The Noble(The Aristocrat).
I just had to tested in both mode to see if it had swapped or something weird, but the class card looks exactly the same in both modes.

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Royal blood (linux)

item.description:
I was thinking that it had something to do with casual. Because royal blood doesn’t matter there.
